name: Tomato Farm
description:
Curric357 GD I

wasd to move; space to interact 

The goal is to plant vegetables and sell them for money. You can toss your crops to the pond, or you can take some water from the pond for irrigation, which will speed up crops' growth. You can also throw your crop into the pond. Seedhouse in the middle. Sale Box in the bottom. 

Tomato: 100$, Sunflower:30$, Spinach: 20$, Carrot: 10$.

So, grow as many tomatoes as you can.
